thread.title: Taylor Swift and Zayn Each Release a Super Sexy Acoustic Cover of Their Fifty Shades Darker Track
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift and Zayn Each Release a Super Sexy Acoustic Cover of Their Fifty Shades Darker Track

author: harpersbazaar.com
title: Taylor Swift and Zayn Each Release a Super Sexy Acoustic Cover of Their Fifty Shades Darker Track
text:
Taylor Swift and Zayn Malik's super steamy track for Fifty Shades Darker is the gift that keeps on giving.
Less than a week after revealing their joint music video for "I Don't Wanna Live Forever," both T-Swift and Zayn have released separate, acoustic covers of the track â€” and both are super intimate and sexy AF. In the videos, which were both released on Thursday, each singer turns the song into a solo track, and the lyrics begin to take on a mind of their own.
 In her video, T-Swift rehearses the song in a clip for her exclusive DirecTV channel .
